Now

In the past week, I got inspired by derek sivers.
It was fun to read his Now page - https://sivers.org/now

So This post is my version of the Now page.
This will help me stay focussed.
It also helps others to connect with me meaningfully and also serves as a guideline for me to say yes or no to new tasks, projects.

Here goes:

I am in mumbai, trying my best to stay focussed and increase my productivity for my new inventions.

I am currently full time  working on :
  • Learn haskell to set up and customize my accounting through hledger.
  • Set up my gtd implementation.
  • Learn to cook palatable food.
  • Learn mechanical design to complete an iteration for Flide motorcycle cover.

Hoping for godspeed.

You can email me on - karan@kodeplay.com to discuss anything you like.
